## Welcome {.unnumbered}

Hello, this website <a href="https://www.ucl.ac.uk/bartlett/casa/"><img src="general_images/casa_logo.jpg" alt="Spatial Analysis of public health course" width="120" align="right" style="margin: 0 1em 0 1em"/></a> holds the material used to support the Spatial Analysis of public health data, part of the MSc in Modelling for Global Health at the University of Oxford.
